resources.string:
Inopco BVBA is a young and dynamic company that is specialised in "General Electricity works."

From the smallest adjustments to the bigger projects.

Our work is tailor made: together with you, we will look for the best solution to your specific situation. You will tell us your ideas, and we will realise them. We can advise you, because we are informed of the latest technological developments.

Contact us if you would like to know more; we are ready to answer your questions.
